author: Reuters Editorial
title: Focus Home Interactive Revenues Down At 10.4 Million Euros In Q5 Of 2017-18 Exceptional 15-Month Financial Year
text:
April 26 (Reuters) - FOCUS HOME INTERACTIVE SA:
* REVENUES OF EUR 10.4 MILLION FOR Q5 (JAN-MARCH 2018) OF 2017-18 EXCEPTIONAL 15-MONTH FINANCIAL YEAR
* YEAR WAS EXTENDED UNTIL MARCH 31 TO MATCH THE COMPANYâ€™S SEASONAL PATTERN OF TRADING
* REVENUE WAS DOWN BY 25% AGAINST PRIOR CALENDAR YEAR (JAN-MARCH 2017) Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
